INFORMATION Brookshire, Texas is a thriving community that is home to dedicated and independent business owners. The town aims to preserve its inventive attitude, rising economy, rural heritage, and sense of community for future generations. Top-tier public and private schools, small enterprises, international industries, and community-based organizations are all located in Brookshire, a thriving and varied business community. Whether our city is your home, your workplace, or you are merely visiting, we hope that you enjoy our small city with big opportunities. News & Announcements Christ Clinic 03 February Christ Clinic is a non-profit medical clinic offering affordable care for the uninsured.
